TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed VirtualReferenceType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the type of resource referenced by a parsed virtual path.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.VirtualReferenceType> enumeration describes the type of resource referenced by a virtual path. The <xref:System.Web.UI.VirtualReferenceType> is determined from the parsed extension of the resource.
Page and control developers do not use the <xref:System.Web.UI.VirtualReferenceType> enumeration directly. Extensibility developers might use the <xref:System.Web.UI.VirtualReferenceType> enumeration when extending the <xref:System.Web.UI.PageParserFilter> class and overriding its <xref:System.Web.UI.PageParserFilter.AllowVirtualReference%2A> method.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.VirtualReferenceType Master = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The parsed virtual path references a master page file.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.VirtualReferenceType Other = int32(4)

Docs.summary: The parsed virtual path references a resource that is not an ASP.NET page, master page, user control, or language-specific code file.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.VirtualReferenceType Page = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The parsed virtual path references an ASP.NET page.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.VirtualReferenceType SourceFile = int32(3)

Docs.summary: The parsed virtual path references a code file that is compiled using a specific language compiler.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.VirtualReferenceType UserControl = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The parsed virtual path references an ASP.NET user control.
